effect.diamond_pearl: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
effect.platinum: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.platinum: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.platinum: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
